title: Mind & Brain as One System
summary: The psyche is not a separate mystical entity but a dynamic system created by brain, body, environment and habits.

title: Neuroplasticity Requires Action
summary: Imagination activates circuits, but only repeated physical action rewires the brain in a meaningful way.

title: Systems Thinking Over Concept Soup
summary: Instead of fighting over terms like ego or anxiety, we look at how beliefs, emotions, drives and environment interact.

title: Default Mode Network & Story Loops
summary: Overactive DMN keeps you in narrative mode. The Psyche System focuses on closing the gap between inner story and outer action.
